entities.name: severus
entities.description: Severus is described as a clever man who has been a good and faithful servant. He is also the one who killed Albus Dumbledore.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as someone who needs to master the Elder Wand in order to master Harry Potter.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore is mentioned as the last owner of the Elder Wand.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as someone Voldemort wants to master.

entities.name: the elder wand
entities.description: The Elder Wand is described as a powerful object that cannot serve Voldemort properly unless he is its true master.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as someone who has been a good and faithful servant, but also as the one who killed Albus Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Voldemort needs to master the Elder Wand in order to truly possess it.
Severus killed Albus Dumbledore, which means that Voldemort cannot truly be the master of the Elder Wand as long as Severus lives.
Voldemort wants to master Harry Potter.
As long as Snape lives, the Elder Wand cannot truly be owned by Voldemort.
